settings.question_1: How do l order on your website and What payment methods do you accept?
settings.text_1:
Simply find the product you'd want and click the 'Add To Cart' button. Fill in your shipping and

billing information and we'll have your order shipped to you as soon as possible! We accept Visa,

Mastercard, American Express, Google Pay and Apple Pay. If you need any support, please

¬†

contact us on¬†qcult.helpukraine@gmail.com
settings.text_2:
We stand by our 15-day-money-back guarantee & 90 days product warranty, which ensures a simple return, refund, or replacement process for our valued clients. We remove all

danger from the purchase process by providing an unrivalled satisfaction guarantee. We'll do everything we can to look after you!

¬†

Customers can return the un-used products within 15 days of receive for a refund. If 15 days have gone by since your purchase, unfortunately, we can‚Äôt offer you a refund or

exchange.
settings.question_3: All about Shipping.Rates&Delivery time  United State Orders
settings.text_3: We offer limited time FREE standard shipping for all orders. For all orders which delivery address is United States Including Alaska and Hawaii, shipped from our warehouse in UK. We aim to try to pick, pack and dispatch all orders within 5 working day. Please be aware that during busy sale periods, Standard delivery orders may take us slightly longer to dispatch due to the high volume of orders.
settings.text_4:
To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition & original packing that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging. All returns are

subjected to 15% restocking fees. We will issue the partial refund of the initial order less 15% of the original purchase to the payment method that you used when placing the order.

¬†

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase. Please contact our customer support at¬†qcult.helpukraine@gmail.com and we are happy to assist you with your request.

Purchases made during any promotional sale are final and cannot be refunded or returned unless there is a manufacturer defect.
settings.question_5: How long does it take to deliver package to my country?
settings.text_5:
US and Canada: 6 - 30 Business Days After Processing

Australia and New Zealand: 7 - 12 Business Days After Processing

Europe: 7 - 14 Business Days After Processing

Latin America: 10 - 25 Business Days After Processing

Other countries: 15 - 30 Business Days After Processing

However some countries might take 2-6 weeks of delivery (Due to the COVID-19 situation, your country customs might delay in processing our package) although we

ship your order and provide the tracking number within 24 hours, it is the shipping carriers and the government who will decide when to deliver your order.

For more information on estimated shipping times for specific countries, visits FAQ page
